Case 22-1426, Document 38-1, 01/05/2023, 3447678, Page1 of 1
NOTICE OF APPEARANCE FOR SUBSTITUTE, ADDITIONAL, OR AMICUS COUNSEL
Short Title: USA v. Maxwell Docket No.: 22-1426
Substitute, Additional, or Amicus Counsel's Contact Information is as follows:
Name: Arthur L. Aidala
Firm: Aidala, Bertuna & Kamins, P.C.
Address: 546 Fifth Avenue, 6th Floor
Telephone: (212) 486-0011 Fax: (718) 921-3292
E-mail: aidalaesq@aidalalaw.com
Appearance for: Ghislaine Maxwell / Defendant-Appellant (party/designation)
Select One:
Substitute counsel (replacing lead counsel: _______________________) (name/firm)
Substitute counsel (replacing other counsel: _______________________) (name/firm)
Additional counsel (co-counsel with: John M. Leventhal / Aidala, Bertuna & Kamins, P.C.) (name/firm)
Amicus (in support of: _______________________) (party/designation)
CERTIFICATION
I certify that:
I am admitted to practice in this Court and, if required by Interim Local Rule 46 10(a)(2), have renewed my admission on _______________________ OR
I applied for admission on _______________________.
Signature of Counsel: Arthur L. Aidala
Type or Print Name: Arthur L. Aidala
DOJ-OGR-00020600

additional_notes: The document is a Notice of Appearance for Substitute, Additional, or Amicus Counsel in the case USA v. Maxwell. It contains contact information for Arthur L. Aidala and indicates that he is appearing as additional counsel for Ghislaine Maxwell. The document is signed by Arthur L. Aidala.
